languages.text: "Значит, я — самопровозглашенная судья, и палач, и кумир. И судьба моя в том, чтобы держать стадо в страхе и послушании".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, я — и судья, и палач, и кумир. И долг мой заключается в том, чтобы держать стадо в страхе и послушании".

languages.text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
languages.original_text: "Значит, я — самопровозглашенная судья, и палач, и кумир. И судьба моя в том, чтобы держать стадо в страхе и послушании".

traits.locale_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And my destiny is to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
"Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And my destiny is to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
"Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
"Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
"Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
"Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

languages.text: «Entonces eso me convierte en autoproclamada juez, verdugo e ídolo. Y mi destino es garantizar el temor y la obediencia del rebaño».
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces eso me convierte en autoproclamada juez, verdugo e ídolo. Y mi destino es garantizar el temor y la obediencia del rebaño».

languages.text: 「それなら、私は裁判官であり、死刑執行人であり、偶像であると自称したことになる。群れを恐れさせ、従わせることが私の宿命なの」
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、私は裁判官であり、死刑執行人であり、偶像であると自称したことになる。群れを恐れさせ、従わせることが私の宿命なの」

languages.text: “也就是说，我自称为仲裁者、刽子手与领袖，我的使命就是让牧群保持恐惧、服从。”
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，我自称为仲裁者、刽子手与领袖，我的使命就是让牧群保持恐惧、服从。”

languages.text: "Dann bin ich selbst erklärt Richter, Henker und Götze. Und es ist meine Bestimmung, die Herde ängstlich und gehorsam zu halten."
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

traits.locale_text: "Dann bin ich selbst erklärt Richter, Henker und Götze. Und es ist meine Bestimmung, die Herde ängstlich und gehorsam zu halten."

languages.text: « Alors, cela fait de moi un juge, un bourreau et une idole autoproclamés. Et mon destin veut que je fasse régner la peur et l'obéissance parmi les fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, cela fait de moi un juge, un bourreau et une idole autoproclamés. Et mon destin veut que je fasse régner la peur et l'obéissance parmi les fidèles. »

languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."

languages.text: "O hâlde kendi kendini yargıç, cellat ve mabut ilan etmiş birisi oluyorum. Sürünün korkup itaat etmesini sağlamak da benim kaderimde yazılı."
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me a self-proclaimed judge, executioner, and idol. And it is my destiny to keep the herd fearful and obedient."
